title: Genius Daddy in the City - Novel Updates
tags: Arrogant Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Body Tempering   Childcare   Cultivation   Gangs   Immortals   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Pill Concocting   Poor to Rich   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Racism   Returning from Another World   Strong to Stronger   Transmigration   Underestimated Protagonist   Wealthy Characters
author: Beneath The Lonely Mountain Tree
description:
An ordinary man, Ye Chen traveled to the cultivation world by accident and became a phenomenal immortal of that era. After 3,000 years in the cultivation world, he was betrayed and traveled back to earth through a spatial tear.
Five years had passed in the mortal world, but when he came back with his abilities, he found out he now has a daughter!>
